title: Divide-and-Conquer Monte Carlo Tree Search For Goal-Directed Planning
content: This paper is published by  Giambattista Parascandolo, Lars Buesing, Josh Merel and so on. You can find this paper on https://arxiv.org/abs/2004.11410.
